title: Spirit Visage might need to be looked at for the percent healing.
body:
Rhaast form is very strong with Spirit Visage and just 1v9 2 tanks 1 mage 1 assassin and 1 adc with no problem without even popping GA. It would be awesome if I could get some answers or even maybe the balancing team to take a look into this item. Sorry didn't realize that the link got messed up when uploading it here is the clip.

https://streamable.com/vf22j

replies.body: Upload the clip to streamable.com or gyfcat.com and link it to us.
Rhaast is strong like that even without spirit visage.

...what?

so if i get this right you wanna see SV nerfed cuz rhaast is too good with it? if that's truly the case, maybe nerf rhaast?
also imagine nerfing a champion for his healing while healing is the only thing which his kit has

> [{quoted}](name=SlapMyBean,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ifTKUBE3,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2019-05-07T19:57:50.102+0000)
>
> https://streamable.com/vf22j

i'mma need some actual info before that means anything. Just looks like he's stupidly fed, level 12 ashe and pyke vs lvl 18 rhaast...
well just look at the gold and we were ahead in kills. also ashe and pyke were level 17 not 12...
